snippet: An appeals court dismissed an effort by activists to have a judge issue arrest warrants for two police officers in the fatal shooting of a boy holding a pellet gun.
abstract: Eighth District Court of Appeals in Ohio upholds ruling that Municipal Judge Ronald Adrine lacks authority to charge police officers Frank Garmback and Timothy Loehmann in fatal shooting of 12-year-old Tamir Rice.
lead_paragraph: An appeals court dismissed an effort by activists to have a judge issue arrest warrants for two police officers in the fatal shooting of a boy holding a pellet gun.

headline.main: Ohio: Court Rebuffs Group’s Effort to Charge Officers
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Court Rebuffs Group’s Effort to Charge Officers
